members.member:
\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) Get API version
The API version \~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 获取API版本
API版本

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) Get Avalonia library's version
The Avalonia library's version \~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 获取Avalonia库版本
Avalonia库版本

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) Get 3rd party software license notices
The 3rd party software license notices \~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 获取使用的第三方软件版权声明
键为标题，值为版权声明

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) Utility functions for Avalonia application
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) Avalonia应用程序相关的实用函数

\~English
Initialize application
Whether initialization is successful \~Chinese
应用程序初始化
是否成功

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.12) Initialize application with the specified AppBuilder
The function to create AppBuilder object Whether initialization is successful \~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.12) 使用指定的AppBuilder进行应用程序初始化
创建AppBuilder对象的函数 是否成功

\~English
Run application
The main window \~Chinese
运行应用程序
主窗口

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.2.5) Run the dialog action
The dialog action, with the active window as argument Owner of the dialog, null to use main window Whether the dialog action is invoked \~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.2.5) 运行对话框函数
对话框函数，最顶层活动窗口作为输入参数 对话框所有者，若使用主窗口则设为null 对话框函数是否已执行

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.2) Show message box
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.2) 显示消息框

\~English
Get application's work path
Work path \~Chinese
获取应用程序的工作路径
工作路径

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.13) Get current main window
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.13) 获取当前主窗口

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.1.1) Get initialization result of Eto framework, null means not initialized yet
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.1.1) 获取Eto初始化结果，null表示还未进行初始化

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) Default application object
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 默认的应用程序对象

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.1.4) Application object using simple style
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.1.4) 使用简易样式的应用程序对象

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.2.8) Color picker dialog
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.2.8) 颜色选择对话框

member.name: M:ASEva.UIAvalonia.ColorPickerDialog.InitializeComponent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wires up the controls and optionally loads XAML markup and attaches dev tools (if Avalonia.Diagnostics package is referenced).
member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

members.member:
\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) UI panel for configuration
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 配置界面控件，用于实现可视化配置

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing panel's size
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在初始化控件尺寸时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing the panel
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件初始化时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called before destroying the panel
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件销毁前被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while updating the panel's UI
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要更新界面时被调用

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.13) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for running modal dialog
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.13) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行模态对话

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.15) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for asynchronous calls
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.15) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行异步调用

\~English
Close the container holding the panel
\~Chinese
关闭配置界面

\~English
Implement closing the panel container in this event
\~Chinese
在此事件中实现配置界面的关闭

member.name: M:ASEva.UIAvalonia.EtoConfigPanel.InitializeComponent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wires up the controls and optionally loads XAML markup and attaches dev tools (if Avalonia.Diagnostics package is referenced).
member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

member.name: M:ASEva.UIAvalonia.EtoWindowPanel.InitializeComponent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wires up the controls and optionally loads XAML markup and attaches dev tools (if Avalonia.Diagnostics package is referenced).
member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

members.member:
\~English
(api:avalonia=1.1.0) Panel conversion tool
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.1.0) 面板转换工具

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.1.3) Enable converting WPF panel to Avalonia panel
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.1.3) 启用WPF面板转Avalonia面板功能

\~English
Convert any window panel to Avalonia window panel
Any window panel Avalonia window panel, null if conversion failed \~Chinese
将任意窗口面板转化为Avalonia窗口面板
任意窗口面板 Avalonia窗口面板，若转化失败则返回null

\~English
Convert any config panel to Avalonia config panel
Any config panel Avalonia config panel, null if conversion failed \~Chinese
将任意配置面板转化为Avalonia配置面板
任意配置面板 Avalonia配置面板，若转化失败则返回null

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) For embedding Eto control in Avalonia GUI
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 用于在Avalonia界面中嵌入Eto控件

\~English
The Eto control to be embedded. Either this or NativeControl should be set just after calling constructor's InitializeComponent
\~Chinese
待嵌入的Eto控件，需要在构造函数调用InitializeComponent后立即设置 (与NativeControl二选一)

\~English
The native control to be embedded. Either this or EtoControl should be set just after calling constructor's InitializeComponent
\~Chinese
待嵌入的原生控件，需要在构造函数调用InitializeComponent后立即设置 (与EtoControl二选一)

\~English
Not for user
\~Chinese
无需直接调用

member.summary: Wires up the controls and optionally loads XAML markup and attaches dev tools (if Avalonia.Diagnostics package is referenced).
member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

members.member:
\~English
(api:avalonia=1.2.6) Extensions for bitmap operations
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.2.6) 方便图像操作

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) Extensions for common image object
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) 方便使用通用图像数据的扩展

\~English
Convert to Avalonia bitmap object
Common image object Avalonia bitmap object \~Chinese
转为Avalonia位图对象
通用图像数据 Avalonia位图对象

\~English
Convert to common image object
Avalonia bitmap object Common image object \~Chinese
转为通用图像数据
Avalonia位图对象 通用图像数据

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) Extensions for common image object
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) 方便使用通用图像数据的扩展

\~English
Convert to Skia image object
Common image object Skia image object (After you're done using it, it's recommended to call "Dispose" immediately to reduce memory usage) \~Chinese
转为Skia图像对象
通用图像数据 Skia图像对象（使用完毕后建议及时调用Dispose，可减少内存占用）

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) Extensions for conversion between structures
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) 方便进行结构体转换操作的扩展

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) Extensions for conversion between structures
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) 方便进行结构体转换操作的扩展

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) Extensions for Skia canvas
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.8) 方便操作Skia画布的扩展

\~English
Get default font
Skia canvas object Ratio to the default size \~Chinese
获取默认字体
Skia画布 相对于默认尺寸的比例

\~English
Get the specified font object
Skia canvas object Font name Ratio to the default size Font weight Font width Font slant Font object \~Chinese
获取指定字体
Skia画布 字体名称 相对于默认尺寸的比例 字重 宽度 倾斜度 字体对象

\~English
Draw text with the specified anchor
Skia canvas object Text Font Text color Anchor point's type along X-coordinate Anchor point's type along Y-coordinate X-coordinate of anchor point Y-coordinate of anchor point \~Chinese
指定锚点绘制文本
Skia画布 文本 字体 文字颜色 X轴上的文本锚点坐标位置类型 Y轴上的文本锚点坐标位置类型 文本锚点X轴逻辑坐标 文本锚点Y轴逻辑坐标

\~English
Measure text's size
Skia canvas object Text Font Text's logical size \~Chinese
测量文本的尺寸
Skia画布 文本 字体 文本的逻辑尺寸

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.2.6) Extensions for control snapshot
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.2.6) 方便控件截图

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.3) Extensions for adding text resource
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.3) 方便添加文本资源的扩展

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.2.3) Extensions for getting window information
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.2.3) 方便获取窗口信息的扩展

\~English
Get the parent window of the specified control
\~Chinese
获取控件所属窗口

\~English
Get the top active window (dialog) of the specified window
\~Chinese
获取窗口的最顶层活动窗口(对话框)

\~English
Get the top active window (dialog) of the window owning the specified control
\~Chinese
获取控件所属窗口的最顶层活动窗口(对话框)

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.16) Conversion of image object
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.16) 图像对象转换

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.9) Skia view render event argument
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.9) SkiaView渲染事件参数

\~English
Skia canvas object
\~Chinese
Skia画布对象

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.9) Skia view
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.9) Skia绘制视图

\~English
Render event
\~Chinese
渲染事件

\~English
Constructor
\~Chinese
构造函数

\~English
Request new rendering
\~Chinese
提交新的渲染请求

member.name: M:ASEva.UIAvalonia.SkiaView.InitializeComponent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wires up the controls and optionally loads XAML markup and attaches dev tools (if Avalonia.Diagnostics package is referenced).
member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

members.member:
\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) UI panel for child window
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.0) 窗口控件，用于实现窗口组件的实际功能

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing panel's size
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在初始化控件尺寸时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing the panel
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件初始化时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while getting the configuration string
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 获取配置字符串时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while new data arrived. If there's a sample buffer, use ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin to remove data outside the buffer range after adding new sample. In addition, since ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI won't be called while the child window is hidden, you can use ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample to perform background processing (ManualTriggerSample's frequency is 50Hz)
New data, see ASEva.CommonWorkflow.OnInputData \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在获得新数据时被调用。如果存在样本缓存，则需要在添加至缓存后使用 ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin 将缓存范围外数据移除。另外，由于窗口隐藏时将不会调用 ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI ，所以可以在此函数中的data为 ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample 时进行后台处理（ManualTriggerSample频率为50Hz）
新数据，详见 ASEva.CommonWorkflow.OnInputData

\~English
[Optional] Called while needed to reset data buffer
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要重置数据缓存时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while starting a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮开始时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while stopping a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮结束时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while updating the panel's UI. All UI related updating should be put here. Note that this function won't be called when the child window is hidden
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要更新界面时被调用。所有与界面相关的更新应全部放在此函数内实现。需要注意，窗口隐藏时将不会调用此函数

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.13) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for running modal dialog
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.13) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行模态对话

\~English
(api:avalonia=1.0.15) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for asynchronous calls
\~Chinese
(api:avalonia=1.0.15) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行异步调用

\~English
[Optional] Called before destroying the panel
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在窗口控件销毁前被调用
